::: {#hero-heading}
I work specifically at the  [Research team on innovation process -ERPI- Laboratory](https://erpi.univ-lorraine.fr/) and teach at the [National School in Industrial Systems Engineering and Innovation -ENSGSI School-](https://ensgsi.univ-lorraine.fr/nos-formations/) at Nancy - France.

My research is developed at the [Lorraine Fab Living Lab Plateform](https://lf2l.fr/) on projects related to the concept of Distributed recycling for circular economy perspectives valuing the partnership between *open source* tools, social innovation spaces, holistic indicators as a way to effect change in people's.

[Learn more about my research &rarr;](/about){.about-links .subtitle}

:::
